note:
Activist, thrift store worker, union organizer and rep for my workplace. Still learning social media, kind of a nerd. He/him.

Profile picture is a studio portrait of a brown haired, middle-aged white man. Photo by: Trevor McNaughton @ https://inFocusLondon.ca/

Header picture is the flag of Palestine.

I'm here primarily to amplify anyone who cares about Palestinians but sometimes I will also post stuff that's cool or radical. I boost in English and French.

fields.name: Open to:
fields.value: feedback, replies, questions, concerns, collaboration, mutual aid requests, solidarity, and crazy ideas.
